snippet: Top track athletes can earn hundreds of thousands of dollars a year, but most athletes struggle to make enough money from sponsorships.
abstract: New international rule will give professional track and field athletes greater opportunity to display logos on their uniforms and, they hope, enhance their chances of attracting corporate sponsorships to help finances their careers in a sport struggling for visibility.
lead_paragraph: Top track athletes can earn hundreds of thousands of dollars a year, but most athletes struggle to make enough money from sponsorships.

headline.seo: Track Officials Loosen Sponsorship Rules for Athletes
headline.main: As Sponsorships Dwindle, Track Officials Loosen the Rules for Athletes
headline.print_headline: As Sponsorships Dwindle, Track Officials Loosen the Rules for Athletes
